Get-FriendlySize

SYNOPSIS

Converts byte values to human-readable size strings.

SYNTAX

Get-FriendlySize [-bytes] [-ProgressAction ] []

DESCRIPTION

Converts numeric byte values to formatted strings with appropriate units (Bytes, KB, MB, GB, TB, PB). Automatically selects the most appropriate unit and formats with 2 decimal places.

EXAMPLES

EXAMPLE 1

Get-FriendlySize -bytes 1073741824

Returns: ‚Äú1.00 GB‚Äù

EXAMPLE 2

Get-FriendlySize -bytes 1536

Returns: ‚Äú1.50 KB‚Äù

PARAMETERS

-bytes

The number of bytes to convert to a friendly format.
